name: Space Racers
description:
Hello! This game is made by a small student team for their final year of university. It's not done yet, but we're sharing here so we can get some feedback from you. If you have the time, please leave a rating and fill out the survey below. Also share with your friends! Thanks!!

HERE IS THE LINK TO THE FEEDBACK FORM BELOW:

https://forms.gle/Mti8okzee4C4yniy7
